message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with the problem of handwritten digit recognition, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE). The use of genetic algorithms (GAs) for optimizing the selection of local features is also a common topic in evolutionary computation (cs.NE). Finally, the paper also involves information retrieval (cs.IR) in terms of selecting the true class of the input pattern from a group of candidate classes.
